title: 起床战争会大厅？
author: WDN2MD
txt_content: 我是bc服，然后我的起床战争是一端一图的 想实现结束回到当前游戏大厅而不是服务器总大厅、求大佬怎么办

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 PercyDan 于 2020-7-13 09:14 编辑 

在大厅输入/bw setmainlobby [游戏名]
配置文件：endgame:
  mainlobby-enabled: true
  all-players-to-mainlobby: true
bungeecord:
  enabled: true
  hubserver: [起床BC服名字]
  endgame-in-lobby: true
  full-restart: false
  spigot-restart: false

replies.author: WDN2MD
replies.txt_content:
PercyDan 发表于 2020-7-13 08:45
在大厅输入/bw setmainlobby [游戏名]
配置文件：endgame:
  mainlobby-enabled: true
什么插件？bedwarsRel? 还是BEDWARS

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
supriseME 发表于 2020-7-13 11:23
什么插件？bedwarsRel? 还是BEDWARS
BedwarsRel

replies.author: WDN2MD
replies.txt_content:
PercyDan 发表于 2020-7-13 11:44
BedwarsRel
好的谢谢
